title: Leaving/Dropped out of queue automatically
body:
For some reason, my League Client keeps exiting me out of queue without letting me accept.  As soon as the afk-check appears, it cancels automatically and notification says that I left, which I didn't.

If someone has any idea as to what is happening, I would appreciate knowing it.

replies.body: This can happen if your connection is failing to transition from the matchmaking service and into champion select.  I recommend going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, otherwise continuing to auto-decline will result in a lower priority queue.  I know you're not intentionally declining, but it still causes a negative impact on the queue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Is it possible that an improperly set up router may cause some issues to the connection?  I should have mentioned earlier that my issue is happening after the time of the router replacement.
